name: Reflective Light
description: Blast up to three enemies with a charge of radiant heat, dealing 1199 Flame Damage, an additional 2315 Flame Damage over 10 seconds, and reducing their Movement Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.  Upon activation you gain Major Savagery and Major Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
effectLines: Splits the projectile, allowing it to affect two additional nearby enemies.  Briefly snares enemies hit.

Upon activation you gain Major Savagery and Major Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
